author: etan_status
content:
The beacon state only contains the latest deposit contract root, as well as the deposit import progress index. 
But to process new deposits, we need to create new merkle proofs (needs more than just the top root) and we currently construct the deposit contract state from logs.
So yeah, what potuz linked, essentially ðŸ™‚ 
BTW, it would also be beneficial if the deposit contract would be among the first things to sync, to unlock CL sync accelerations such as "light-client sync to wall slot, then import validator keys from deposit contract, then sync CL blocks backwards".
